collapsiblevector: UI means User Interface. Vector is the name of an interface skin.
collapsiblevector-collapsiblenav-prefere: The message refers to the sidebar, whose sections are collapsible in Vector skin (some of them collapsed by default and some no); the preference disables collapsing entirely and is among "Advanced options" in the "Appearance" section.
collapsiblevector-noexperiments-preferen: The message refers to removing your self from experiments
